panels.content:
- Auto-Generated dashboards from Elastic APM datasource
- Metrics are recorded using the APM agent. 
- Use Kibana link in for direct access to Kibana APM dashboard
panels.title: Summary

panels.description: average response times for this service. alert in microseconds (us)

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: transaction

panels.title: accountingservice transaction duration

targets.query: service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: error AND transaction.type: request

panels.description:
Where the application is spending most of its time. 

For example, is your app spending time in external calls, database processing, or application code execution?

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: span AND span.type: external
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: span AND span.type: messaging
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: span AND span.type: db
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.type: app
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.type: template

panels.title: Time spent by span type

panels.description:
RPM broken down by HTTP response codes: 2xx, 3xx, etc., 

Useful for determining if you’re serving more of one code than you typically do

targets.query: service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: "HTTP 2xx"
service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: "HTTP 3xx"
service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: "HTTP 4xx"
service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: "HTTP 5xx"

panels.title: Requests per min

panels.description: HTTP5X Errors displayed only - (low throughput this metric compared to other response codes)

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: "HTTP 5xx"

panels.title: Requests per min HTTP5X

panels.description: Overall response times for this service, broken down into average, 95th & 99th percentile.

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: transaction
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: transaction

panels.title: Transaction duration

panels.description:
Where the application is spending most of its time. 

For example, is your app spending time in external calls, database processing, or application code execution?

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: Dust
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: RawData
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: mysql
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: postgresql
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: redis
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: jms
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: OrionRedirect
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: Jstl
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: Redirect
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND span.subtype: InternalResource

panels.title: Time spent by span sub-type

panels.description: average response times for this service. alert in microseconds (us)

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: transaction
A

panels.title: Historical transaction duration

panels.description:
Historical RPM (all codes: 2xx, 3xx, etc)

Useful for determining if you’re serving more of one code than you typically do

targets.query: service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.result: *
A

panels.title: Historical RPM

targets.query: observer.type:"apm-server" AND service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: span AND span.type: external
observer.type:"apm-server" AND service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: span AND span.type: external
observer.type:"apm-server" AND service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.type: request
observer.type:"apm-server" AND service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND transaction.type: messaging
service.environment:prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND processor.event: error

panels.description:
system.cpu.total.norm.pct: 

The percentage of CPU time in states other than Idle and IOWait, normalised by the number of cores.

system.process.cpu.total.norm.pct:

The percentage of CPU time spent by the process since the last event. This value is normalized by the number of CPU cores and it ranges from 0 to 100%.

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND system.process.cpu.total.norm.pct: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND system.cpu.total.norm.pct: *

panels.title: CPU usage (all nodes)

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND system.memory.total: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND system.memory.total: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND system.memory.actual.free: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND jvm.memory.heap.committed: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND jvm.memory.heap.used: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND jvm.memory.non_heap.committed: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND jvm.memory.non_heap.used: *
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND labels.name: "G1 Old Generation"
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND labels.name: "G1 Young Generation"
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND labels.name: "G1 Old Generation"
service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND labels.name: "G1 Young Generation"

panels.title: Garbage collection time spent per minute

targets.query: service.environment: prod AND service.name: accountingservice AND jvm.thread.count: *
